comments: Collins (ATL) stops his progress as he adjusts for the pass and incidental contact occurs with Richardson's (DAL) backside as he is airborne.
Huerter (ATL) grasps Finney-Smith's (DAL) left arm as they engage during rebounding and quickly releases as they disengage.
Hill (ATL) extends his hand forward and marginal contact occurs with Doncic's (DAL) front during his dribble.
Hardaway Jr. (DAL) lifts and re-plants his pivot foot at the start of his dribble.

Collins (ATL) is moving alongside Kleber's (DAL) path and absorbs the body contact made after Kleber's gather. After the initial body contact, Collins is bringing his arms into a vertical position and absorbs the arm contact made during Kleber's upward shooting motion.
Hardaway Jr. (DAL) moves slightly toward Young (ATL) and marginal contact occurs as Young passes the ball.
Huerter (ATL) swipes down and marginal contact occurs with Doncic's (DAL) right arm as he receives the pass.
Capela (ATL) cleanly bats the ball forward prior to incidental contact occurring with Hardaway Jr. (DAL).
Hill (ATL) brings his hand forward and marginal contact occurs with Doncic's (DAL) left arm during his drive toward the lane.
Young (ATL) is turning away from Doncic (DAL) when he brushes Doncic's left side during the driving shot attempt.
Collins (ATL) moves backward toward Porzingis (DAL) and marginal body contact occurs as Porzingis is planting to retrieve the rebound.
Porzingis (DAL) makes contact with the ball after it has rolled off of the imaginary cylinder above the rim.
Richardson (DAL) has his hands on Young's (ATL) hips and quickly slides them off during the inbound.
Gallinari (ATL) and Doncic (DAL) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
Richardson (DAL) splits his feet prior to the foul being committed.
Gallinari (ATL) commits the take foul on Richardson (DAL).
Collins (ATL) moves towards Porzingis (DAL) and marginal contact occurs prior to his pass.
Huerter (ATL) commits the take foul on Richardson (DAL).
Huerter (ATL) makes clean contact with the ball prior to any incidental contact occurring with Hardaway Jr. (DAL) thereafter.
Huerter (ATL) commits the take foul on Hardaway Jr. (DAL).
Young (ATL) brings his off-arm toward Richardson's (DAL) front and marginal contact occurs as Young naturally releases away.
Finney-Smith (DAL) has his hands rested on Collins' (ATL) backside and marginal contact occurs as Collins moves underneath the basket.
Doncic (DAL) brings his left hand forward and marginal contact occurs with Collins' (ATL) backside after Doncic back-taps the ball.
Gallinari (ATL) commits the take foul on Doncic (DAL).
Finney-Smith (DAL) has his hand slightly extended forward as marginal contact occurs with Collins' (ATL) side along the sideline.
